channel.description: Demography, Data Science, and other Deliberations

item.title: NB1 and NB2 Dispersion
item.author: Neal Marquez
item.description: The other day I started working with a colleague on propagating uncertainty for a negative binomial generalized linear model. To my surprise I found that there was a couple of different ways to define the probability distribution that led to more than a bit of confusion on my end.

item.title: Latex with Jekyll
item.author: Neal Marquez
item.description: I am trying out a new layout that will hopefully let me do inline latex like so as well as its own thing like

item.title: Hello Worlds
item.author: Neal Marquez
item.description: Setting up a blog so I have a place to post my ideas and work that I manage to do outside of work and school (ha!). Hoping this is the beginning of something long and beautiful so here goes nothing.
